activities: Third Floor Fun, LLC and its affiliates receive personal information from EU and Swiss residents in connection with its marketing and consumer engagement activities in the United States and abroad.  In general, the personal information collected by Third Floor Fun, LLC and its affiliates enables us to administer contests, improve, develop, provide and analyze our services, administer our business, and monitor compliance with applicable laws and internal policies.
